metadata.Title: CVE-2022-3309 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: Use after free in assistant in Google Chrome on ChromeOS prior to106.0.5249.62 allowed a remote attacker who convinced a user to engage inspecific UI gestures to potentially perform a sandbox escape via specificUI gestures. (Chromium security severity: Medium)

criterions.comment: chromium-browser: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
